storyInfo: Brentwood, a small town, is under the control of the Sarkaz, who are having its residents build an Arts Circle. Magdelene, the town's flower shop owner encounters Feist and Rockrock, who infiltrated for reconnaissance. The mayor refuses their plea for assistance.

attributes.text: Notice
1) Residents must comply with all regulations previously announced by the Military Commission
\n2) Must comply with all work safety regulations. No time off allowed whatsoever
\n3) Leaving your place of residence after 7 PM is strictly forbidden
\n4) Mourning Mayor West in any manner is forbidden
Acting Mayor of Brentwood
\nFreda West
I still don't have the seed.
\nCan we still have those flowers ready by next year's harvest festival?
\nI don't want my family's traditions to die in my hands...

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Good morning, Magdelene, *Burp*—
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Were you drunk last night?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Hehe, Old Henk and I... had a teeny tiny taste of the Mayor's leftover booze.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: I'll let you in on a little secret, Mr. West had more than just fine wine brewing for the celebration! *hic*—
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: —He was hiding a whole cannon behind our backs! The last time I saw one of those, it was the harvest when we were ten!
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: I'll definitely invite you to a dance during the gun salute at next year's festival, Magdelene!
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: You're still really drunk, you know that?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I just hope that the flash powder hasn't gotten wet, with all the barrels it was stored alongside.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: It'll only be a few more days. Once we're finished with that bloody thing the devils are having us build, they'll leave us alone.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Then, when the time comes for next year's harvest festival, we'll get to celebrate the return of our normal lives all night long—
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Hm—When did you start hanging clocks in the greenhouse?
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: It's a long time past the time everyone's supposed to gather to head to work. Are you skiving off work today?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: They won't notice a single man missing.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: I'm getting ready to head there. I know there's a back alley behind your greenhouse that leads straight to the work site.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Strange, though. Them devils don't often loiter around here...
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: The door's over there... I'll head there right now!
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: See you! *hic*—
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Wait, Will! Don't open that door!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Oww—Magdelene, did a flower pot crack my skull open?
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Nothing happened...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: *sigh*, you're still drunk. The door outside is that way. I'll take you to the work site.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Right, I gotta remember to bring a bouquet to mourn Mr. West. It's a shame he didn't get to taste the wine he was brewing...
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: You didn't see the notice they put up today?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: What notice? *hic*—
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Never mind. Take this flower.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: Brentwood has visibly deteriorated over the last few years.

Although Mayor West racked his brains to try to turn things around, his ideas all yielded little results. Though caravans once visited in droves, none of them are willing to visit this forgotten town any more.
\nEveryone has been suffocating thanks to the ever-approaching war and the worsening situation in Londinium.
\nTwo weeks ago, all of us gathered at the top of the town hall tower and saw a Catastrophe cloud rising into the sky in Londinium's direction.
\nMayor West hesitated for half a day, and gave up on sending a team to Londinium to find out what happened. There were only the rumors that 'war has broken out.'
It was only when the Sarkaz came that the town regained its former 'vigor.' They hired all of us with food.

\nEveryone scrambled to line up for work day after day, and gave everything their all in exchange of the limited food there is. We're all very industrious. In a few short weeks, the thing that they had us build is already starting to take shape.
With the promise of survival dangling in front of us, we strained to forget how Mr. West died.
\nIf there's no one working the farms anymore...
\nThen what is the harvest festival that everyone is so looking forward to actually celebrating?

attributes.content: Will, they're coming this way. Wake up!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Dammit, Will... I told you not to drink so much!
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Sir, this man broke the rules. I'll be taking him to confinement to reflect on what he's done.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Looks like you enjoy the power we've granted you, Feline.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: I... I just don't want anyone to break the rules we agreed on.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Hmph, I can tell you're trying to protect him. Childish tricks.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: You'd best remember how your unlucky father died.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: His Highness is willing to overlook your disrespectful attitude before. That alone is your greatest reward.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: What we need now are honest workers. It's that simple.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: I... It won't happen again, sir. I swear!
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: That's right. Your legs should be shaking.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: Don't worry. You'll live. If you were dead, I'd have to find a *Sarkaz profanity* to do your job.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: I'll keep an eye on him. I promise there will be no delays.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Better not be. I don't care who picks up his slack, as long as one of you does.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: Not you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: Now get back to your posts. I don't want the boss to chew me out.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: Scram.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Supervisor

attributes.content: Magdelene, please. Let me take care of him. He'll sober up in confinement.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: I'm sober! I wouldn't dare fall behind on the schedule they set.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Wait till you can stand before you act tough. If you pass out at the work site, I won't be able to save you.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: *sigh*... I shouldn't have given you the keys to the warehouse yesterday.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Are these flowers... for me?
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Hah, of course not.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: I got them to mourn Mr. West.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: You didn't see the notice I put out today?
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: He had too much to drink yesterday, so...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Sorry, Freda... I was only going to have a little sip—
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: —but that bastard Tom started spouting nonsense. He says you're a haughty traitor riding the devils' coattails!
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: We're managing to get by these days only because you kowtowed to the devils.
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: Old Henk and I were proper pissed off. We challenged the bastard to some drinking games, but we got careless and didn't stop, *hic*—
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: What they think doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Never mind. Give me the flowers. Let me thank you in my father's place.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Maybe we could hold a ceremony for Mr. West in the warehouse he was secretly making his preparations in.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: The Sarkaz rarely go there.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Thanks, Magdelene.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: My guess is that you got the flowers. He's not smart enough.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: But you should go back. I just heard... a group of outsiders appeared in the village a few days ago. Not the dukes' army, but they are armed.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are afraid someone in town could help them. They'll start today's search ahead of schedule.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: So early?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: What is she running that fast for? Is she in a rush?
attributes.name: Will

attributes.content: For your own good, I suggest you stop bothering her so much.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: She has her own troubles to take care of. Now go. Sober up in confinement. *sigh*...
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: My men saw you go to the work site, Gardener.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Do not exhaust my trust in you.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: How can I get rid of him?
\nI hope he hasn't found anything.

attributes.content: You hung up the clock I gave you.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Very good. That'll help you to remember your work hours and not to leave your post.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: He's got mud on his hands.
\nDid he turn my daisies' soil?

attributes.content: I didn't give my subordinates permission to muck around with your greenhouse—
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Hmph, you might as well just search out in the open. No need to be so cautious about me.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Or are you trying to look for these?
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: Phew, good thing it's just those seeds.

attributes.content: These seeds are not on my list of approved transactions.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: I don't care how you got your hands on these, but I suggest you knock it off with the stupid ideas.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: From today onwards, we'll deal with any suspicious individuals directly.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Why am I even telling you this?
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Anyway, you'd better stay in line. Don't do anything stupid.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: It's so quiet, it's eerie.
\nShould I turn around and look?

attributes.content: I like the flowers you're growing, these 'roses.' We don't have them in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: There's a battle. I need to leave town, and I won't be back so often anymore.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: You must be happy about that.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: Send these flowers to my tent later, Gardener. This coin is my down payment.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.content: One last word of advice. Don't go near the work site at the center of the town.
attributes.name: Royal Court Junior Officer

attributes.text: These scary men are interested in such fragile flowers?

attributes.content: Oh! My roses...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: The white petals are stained in red blood.
\nWas his hand pricked by the roses' thorns?
He didn't feel any pain?
\nWeird Sarkaz.

attributes.content: Oh no!
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: It's safe now! Are all of you okay?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Phew—Free at last. It's such a tight squeeze inside!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Easy. You were just about ready to fight him, weren't you?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I know we can't bring trouble so soon—
attributes.name: Feist
Magdelene
attributes.content: Sorry, Rockrock...

attributes.name: Magdelene
attributes.content: And...
I'm Feist.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I didn't expect them to start looking so early today. I heard there's a group of... 'armed militants' outside the town.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.text: The two of them look at each other.

attributes.content: We're sorry for all the trouble.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Magdelene, right? Things here are a little not like what we expected.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The situation is a bit... awful, I suppose? But there's a surface-level 'peace' maintained here.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Do the villagers serve the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.text: Although the face of the young man named Feist shows many signs of battle weathering, I can nonetheless see a fearless courage in his clear eyes.
\nRockrock seems to be his partner. I can imagine the two of them fighting alongside each other.
It's been some time since I saw such zealous vigor in this town.

attributes.content: It's not a problem. It's true... Our town is working for the Sarkaz. Normal for Rockrock to be having doubts.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: You told me you were refugees...
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: I'm guessing you must be more than refugees who escaped Londinium, seeking supplies?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Sorry about that. We didn't tell you who we were before.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We're with the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Londinium... But what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Hm, it's a long story, and we'll have time to talk more about that.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But first, could you tell me what the Sarkaz are building in the center of the town?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Kal—Our consultant is worried about what's being built here. Feist and I have tried getting closer to the area, but the Sarkaz are guarding the place very tightly.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: We could only see a giant blood-red crystal.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It's much bigger than all the other ones that we've seen in both scale and complexity.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You mean... the thing we are building here isn't unique to this place?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: We believe this is one of the Sarkaz's combat Arts Circles, but Brentwood's might be more special than that.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Our forces are planning to strike this place. Our fighters are... not in the best of shape right now, but with your help—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.text: War.
\nEver since the news came that the dukes have made it here, more and more of the town's residents have been talking about that ever-distant war.
\nBut they only ever let their imaginations run wild lamentably away from the Sarkaz's view.
They only ever boast in their drunkenness, that the dukes' fleets will follow the routes they whimsically draw on maps to save Victoria.
\nThey fantasize about how the Sarkaz will run away from Brentwood as they shout their rallying cries.
But what exactly is war?
\nI can't see any of it whatsoever in this quiet, Sarkaz-controlled town.
\nI don't want to ever see it, either.

attributes.content: The Sarkaz... are going to be leaving very soon. There's nothing that they could want in our town.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Feist, Rockrock, you two should be on your way soon. It's dangerous for outsiders to be here.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: You can take the alley behind the greenhouse. The Sarkaz don't patrol that area.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Even though Brentwood isn't at the forefront of the conflict between the dukes and the Sarkaz... the situation here isn't normal at all.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Whether it's the change in the movement of supplies to Brentwood for the last couple years, the almost intentionally ignored geographical location, and the enormous Arts node you're building.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Where are these Originium crystals from? How did the Sarkaz come up with such a detailed plan in such a short time?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: This is a little embarrassing, but we still don't know what exactly the Sarkaz are trying to do.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That's not a good thing...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Magdelene, if you could help persuade everyone to help, we still have a chance to stop them.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Even if it's just helping us figure out the situation of the Sarkaz garrison stationed here—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You can stop hiding.
Hello, Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: (Feist, the evacuation route we were planning to take is still open.)
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (Let's see how this plays out. We can't give up on this chance to get them on our side.)
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: (If Dr. Kal'tsit's right, what the Military Commission is planning here... has to be extremely important.)
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Relax. I was just passing by, and thought I would thank my friend.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Magdelene, Will said he forgot to say thank you, and asked me to thank you in his stead.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: *sigh*... He's always had those unrealistic fantasies ever since he was a kid.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: (This doesn't feel quite right.)
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (It sounds like Will is the drunkard who almost opened the cupboard we were hiding in?)
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (Shh... Let's not get into that.)
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: *cough*... Freda, I'll leave these two Self-Salvation Corps members to you.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Do you need me to fill you in on their situation?
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: No need. I heard everything outside.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Freda... the mayor—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The Mayor of Brentwood was my father. He's dead.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Fortunately... he's the only one who lost his life in this town so far.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: But I'm afraid I have to turn down your request.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: I respect your bravery to stand up against them... but I can't put all of the town's residents at risk.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: My father had the same idea, and he's already paid the price. Resistance would only bring unnecessary sacrifice.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: The Sarkaz camp is not far from the main entrance to the greenhouse. For your safety, please leave quickly.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Brentwood will take care of its own.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Peace doesn't come easy and... I... I'm afraid of breaking it once more.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Freda, don't you see the problem in that?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: They made me a promise. They'll leave as soon as their plan is completed—
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: You trust the Sarkaz's word?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I have to.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Rockrock, let's go.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Feist!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Mayor Freda, we'll working in the surrounding area. We... We're waiting to rendezvous with our other teams.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: If you need assistance or... if things take a turn for the worse, you can find us there. That's our promise.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Self-Salvation Corps...
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Magdelene, I...
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: No, never mind.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.text: Freda and I don't actually know each other too well. She has always been fairly asocial.
\nIf it wasn't for Will making all kinds of excuses to drag Freda here to buy flowers from me, I likely would never have even known her.
\nPerhaps, like everyone else, I would've seen her as a crazed lunatic who's slaving away for the Sarkaz and dragged everyone else into that along with her.
\nI could even have forgotten that she's the same age as me.

attributes.content: You did save all of us after Mr. West gave his life.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Hmph, I traded everyone's freedom for it.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Someone has to be the villain.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: I'm too afraid to give up, even if it only buys everyone a small chance to survive.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: At the very least... the Sarkaz's leader here... the officer who comes to your greenhouse doesn't kill for fun like the Sarkaz in the rumors. And so, I'd rather keep things the way they are.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: To be honest... I don't know what I should believe myself.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Magdelene, I'm really jealous of you.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Please forgive Will's stubbornness. He's just being childish.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: I've never been mad at him.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: Have you received the seeds I secretly bought for next year's celebration?
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: There were some setbacks, but I have them.
attributes.name: Magdelene

attributes.content: That's good. Hopefully they will lead to the most beautiful flowers by the time the next year's harvest festival is here.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Father planned for this festival for a long time, and I don't want to see his efforts go to waste.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: Please help me with this.
attributes.name: Freda

attributes.content: It's my pleasure.
attributes.name: Magdelene
